description:
This kit bundles the Kids Ride Shotgun Tow Rope with their kid’s hip pack. The hip pack has the cast of animals from Kids Ride Shotgun’s Shred Til Bed book series all over it, and holds the tow rope or offers room for kids to carry their own snacks. The best part of mountain biking is going down, but as they say, “what goes down, must go up”. So, for those unavoidable ups, help your help your little shredder to the top with this Mountain Bike Tow Rope.

  • Water-resistant hip pack fits waists from 38-110cm
  • Pack dimensions: 22.5 x 10 x 8cm
  • Shock absorbing tow rope design keeps the tow consistent and smooth
  • Rated up to 225kg, so you can give your less fit friends a helping pull
  • Internal elastic is interwoven with the rugged webbing outer sheath, adding strength and durability
  • Bright blue colour keeps the tow rope visible to other riders
  • Stretches from 1.7-3.3m
  • Carabiner and attachment loop included
name: Kids Ride Shotgun Mountain Bike Tow Rope and Hip Pack Combo - Children
